main.name: Dea Amelia Setyorini
main.bio: Active Informatics student at Ahmad Dahlan University with a GPA of 3.83. Strong skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, SQL,Python, React, and Java. Experienced in creating responsive websites and UI/UX designs. Improved communication and collaboration skills through student committee participation. Committed to continuous learning and contributing to innovative technological solutions.
